The Birthday Song: Always a Favorite?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): The Birthday Song: Always a Favorite?
By Vince_V_ on Thursday, August 29, 2002 - 01:37 pm:

Do all monsters like Colt's Birthday song?

In my experience all monsters like the cake, but what about the song?

I remember I once raised a Mint who, er, jiggled angrily when asked if she approved of the birhtday song.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, August 29, 2002 - 01:42 pm:

That depends on your raising style. If you are in the harsh/spartan type style they won't like it.

By Vince_V_ on Thursday, August 29, 2002 - 02:04 pm:

The only time any of my monsters ever went to harsh/spartan was when my joker was really making me mad, so i worked him almost to death (but i reloaded from before that). At that time most of my monsters (including the mint) got stuck at fond/doting. Would that work too?

By Bladerunner on Thursday, August 29, 2002 - 03:23 pm:

I had monster that did not like the 1 year old birthday song. He was bad natured, but either even or soft training style. When he turned 2, he liked the song, and he was good natured. Was using the mango method at the time, which never gets to harsh/spartan. I always thought their reaction was based on nature because of that experience.
